DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , interventional cohort study drug-induced sleep endoscopy ( DISE ) evaluate upper airway cohort obstructive sleep apnea ( OSA ) surgical patient . This study investigate reliability technique , demonstrate moderate-substantial interrater test-retest reliability . This research also compare DISE finding lateral cephalogram X-ray examine DISE finding individual respond previous sleep apnea surgery . These paper publish available PubMed . Additional research ongoing , examination DISE finding , comparison evaluation technique , association DISE find surgical outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Drug-Induced Sleep Endoscopy Upper Airway Evaluation Obstructive Sleep Apnea
